NEW <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/quartet-brand-page.aspx?cmp=EBQUARTETAUGUST2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/quartet-brand-page.aspx?cmp=EBQUARTETAUGUST2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Designed to spark new thinking, Quartet® glass dry-erase boards are the perfect canvas for brainstorming, meetings, task tracking and scheduling. Wherever your ideas take you, Quartet® glass boards will help you get there. Learn More <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/quartet-brand-page.aspx?cmp=EBQUARTETAUGUST2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> UP TO 20% OFF Select Quartet® Horizon™ and Evoque™ Premium Glass Boards Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Glass-Dry-Erase-Boards/_/N-ag7?cmp=EBQUARTETAUGUST2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Glass-Dry-Erase-Boards/_/N-ag7?cmp=EBQUARTETAUGUST2019EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Free Shipping applies to orders of $50 or more. Minimum purchase required before taxes and after discounts. Orders outside our local delivery area, oversized and special order items do not qualify. Non-qualifying orders incur a shipping charge based on order size, weight and delivery location (minimum charge of $9.95). Other restrictions apply. See grandandtoy.com/terms <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/terms?cmp=EBSHIPPINGSEPT17EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> or call 1-866-391-8111 for details.
